column1: When Alex asked us to build a three wheel travel scooter, we realized we can do more for him and, at the same time, we can be useful for the entire world. When someone being in a wheelchair needs such a mean of transport, why can’t we come up with a better idea for all those 65 mil people around the world who have the same need?!

Being in a wheelchair, doesn’t mean they should feel sidelined. That’s why we want to help them and to improve their social life activities. We are too enthusiastic to stop over here, our goal is to develop the concept and you are the one who can help us to improve it.

column1:
his Great Escape!

","Alex's story
and for the last 10 years he is captured in a wheelchair by his trauma. He
suffered an accident which caused a spinal cord injury, before this he had an
active lifestyle. Now he wants to be involved in the world outside his room, he
wants to escape it, to work remote, to travel, to take part in special projects
and to continue his once dynamic style of life.
Alex has a job, a salary and kind people around him, he is still an
active citizen, but limited by four walls and a wheelchair for which Republic
of Moldova is still not adapted. Alex can not afford a special car having a
pension which values just 7$ per month, that’s why the AVAI team designed a
special car for Alex relying on community’s support.
are offering a solution for anyone else in need.

This car is a prototype designed for people with special needs. It is based on an existing chassis, which is approved and meets all the standards of safety. Also it has an economic engine and an automatic gearbox. What is unique about this concept is the integrated wheelchair lift - a mechanism that lifts up and adapts the driver in front of the steering wheel.

The wheelchair lift concept is, in fact, a mechanical assembly composed of a metal structure and two platforms, which are operated by hydraulic cylinders. Also, all this mechanism is automated using electronic remote control.

When Alex asked us to build a three wheel travel scooter, we realized we can do more for him and, at the same time, we can be useful for the entire world. When someone being in a wheelchair needs such a mean of transport, why can’t we come up with a better idea for all those 65 mil people around the world who have the same need?!

Being in a wheelchair, doesn’t mean they should feel sidelined. That’s why we want to help them and to improve their social life activities. We are too enthusiastic to stop over here, our goal is to develop the concept and you are the one who can help us to improve it.
Max. output in kW (Hp) at rpm- 52 (71) / 5.800
Parking - Front/Rear Park sensors, Rear view camera
In-car display (240/170 mm) with internet access
Steering wheel fixed to the center
Special mechanism for control acceleration and brake with one hand
Automated emergency call in case of an accident
Automatic recharging system for the wheelchair, when the driver is in the car
We are the team which is going to help Alex in

HELLO PHONO FANS

My name is Dal Basi and I've always loved music, it's been one of my best friends since I was teenager, it's been my refuge from all the not so nice things in life, it's been my teacher and my spiritual guide. Record stores were my temples, libraries and institutions of learning, my way to connect with fellow music nerds and enthusiasts and to explore the world around me.This passion and need to connect and explore led me to my first full time job while in college,  I started at Tower Records Stockton in 1986 and worked for them for over 20 years, It was awesome, I made many life long  friends with both customers and co-workers and it's where I met my wife and learned a lot about myself. It provided me my second family and home away from home.

Then in 2010 I opened my own record store Phono Select records along with one of my best friends and fellow Stockton ex-pat Nich Lujan, it was a dream come true. We curated a fantastic selection of music spanning all genres, creating a dream store we wanted to shop at fulfilling a niche and need for the Sacramento record shopping community, a record store for vinyl lovers by vinyl lovers.  We hosted some very memorable and awesome instore events like a monthly Mix Tape Exchange Party, amazing live performances, art shows, fun record release parties for local bands, craft fairs, just about anything anyone could think about or came to us with, rarely was anything off the table. We were more than a record store we were part of the larger community a place where friends would meet up, a place where new friendships were made. But most of all a place where you could buy great records from some great guys.

Our customers and neighbors became our friends and family. 

We've always felt that a record store is more than just a retail business, 

A record store is a magnet around which express our love of all things music, vinyl culture, art and where we gather to hang out with others who share in this idea. Where we go and geek out together, meet people and make new friends, as a safe and inviting place to hang out and discover music and culture with actual face to face interactions for all ages, where we exchange knowledge, Record stores are homes away from homes that inspire, delight, and spark the imagination, a temple for the outsiders and all those out of step. They help foster relationships and personal and collective growth. In our age of dizzying technological advances, a great record store is an irreplaceable and integral part of any community.

Record stores along with book stores, comic book shops, video stores, museums, live music venues, real coffee shops, libraries and art galleries are an essential integral part of the connective tissue that hold our artist and outsider communities together. It is why we do what we do. It keeps us feeling alive!

 

WHAT'S UP

Phono Select is in the process of moving to a new location that we would like to make our long term and permanent home, since losing our lease at our original location on K Street in midtown Sacramento in 2013 we’ve been in a temporary location on 24th st and 19th ave inside an industrial warehouse space in the Hollywood Park neighborhood. We have been searching for a retail location since moving from K st, something that would allow the store to expand our selection, offer a performance and community space and also expand our inventory of music and pop culture related items such as posters, t-shirts, buttons, stickers, toys and collectibles. We’ve also had a dream of adding a few pinball machines and vintage video games for everyone to enjoy, a great place to just hang out, get a break from it all.

Well, we’ve found a great spot on Fruitridge Rd right around the corner from 24th st. Not only is this place big enough to allow us o get all our records out into bins finally. We are talking 1000's more records than ever before. Yes that's right, all that stuff in the backroom would finally be available for you purchase and no longer boxed up hiding from you back there anymore. It also has a fantastic private fenced in side yard,  where we will host live music performances, food trucks, movie nights, record swaps , art shows and rock n roll garage sales.  We are also looking to forward to partnering up with other local artist, activist, record labels, publishers and enthusiasts to create something fun and unique, something that brings the greater Sacramento music and arts community together to create some great stuff for everyone to share in and enjoy.

We need your help to finish up and bring the new shop online and put us on the road to success and longevity, we are raising funds to offset the costs of getting the building ready from floor to ceiling and everything in between. Getting more inventory, updating equipment and so much more!

PERKS &
column2:
INCENTIVES

In return for your support, you’ll be one of the few to sport swag created exclusively for this campaign by local artists— tote bags, T-shirts, calendars and mix tapes/CDs all created and curated by local artists and Phono Homies.

You’ll be inducted into the Phono Homies club, be a member of our most inner circle, you’ll have an extra special place in our heart and best of all you’ll have our sincerest thanks and undying love.

You’ll be immortalized in a mural on the wall of the courtyard, where we are planning a mural project, Your name will written for everyone to see that you answered our call in our time of need.

 

SWAG + INCENTIVES / THANK YOU GOODIES

The Hug

You get one of my personalized world famous super hugs for caring.

STICKERS + BUTTONS

Exclusive buttons and stickers created by local artists and Phono Homies.

EXCLUSIVE T-SHIRTS

Add some serious class to your wardrobe with these unique ltd ed T-shirts, designed local artists, these are fundraiser only exclusive designs that will not be sold in the store.

TOTE BAG

We will have an exclusive ltd ed canvas tote bag, a fundraiser only designs that will not be sold in the store.

GIFT CERTIFICATE &
column3:
DISCOUNT COUPONS

Different packages have different gift certificates and discount coupons.The Gift Certificates are a way for you to get back part of your donation and the coupons are bonus discount vouchers you can use anytime.

PRIVATE V.I.P. PREVIEW PARTY

This will be an early bird event for supporters to preview the store and get in before the general public, 

BI-MONTHLY MIXTAPE OR CD. Compiled &
column4:
curated by PHONO INSIDERS

We will create and get to you a mixtape or mixCD every other month for a year, it will be like we are dating!

TACO RECORD NIGHT WITH DAL

You'll be invited to a hosted Taco meal with yours truly where I'll drag out some of my  favorite records and I'll spin them for you, we'll hang out drink and chat about records like teenagers.

PHONO VIP MEMBERSHIP CARD

-includes drink of choice while shopping, yes will stock the ice box just for you, including beer

-Guest DJ night, you can come in and decide what gets played in the shop or spin yourself

-pick and introduce a movie on one of our upcoming movie nights

-free swag for a year, every t-shirt, tote or anything PHONO related we create you get one

-anything you like in the bargain bin is yours on us!

-plus anything else we think of that shows you how much we love and appreciate you.

Cheers

Dal

column1: BrightCoach is a proven, science-based Business and Life Coaching organization, already helping people and businesses transform lives, and improve business performance.
We will help over 1,000,000 people in the US and across the world over the next decade, create personal success and move them from where they are - to where they want to be.

column2: >What if you were able to reimagine improving the lives of millions of people?

column1: BrightCoach works closely with both personal and business clients in a unique one-on-one Coaching relationship to create positive change, find their purpose, develop leadership skills, build consciousness, active self-discovery and extraordinary results in their lives, careers, businesses or organizations.
• Transform Your Life or Business to Where You Want it to be

column2: >WE WILL TRANSFORM ONE MILLION LIVES + BUSINESSES.
>To help people create extraordinary lives and businesses.
>We will help 1,000,000 individuals and business leaders across the world, maximize their potential to become extraordinary and live their best life.

column1: We have spent the last year building BrightCoach.
• We have developed a very competitive ramp-up and expansion strategy that will allow BrightCoach to expand into cities, towns and rural areas across the US, and other parts of the world.
• We have determined the infrastructure, resources, people, brand, technologies, performance and path we need to be successful.
• We have developed a world-class brand, and BrightCoach culture that will work in all countries, demographics, and cultures.
• We have created the industry's most sophisticated marketing capabilities.

• We have created our proprietary BrightCoach platform that incorporates all elements of Coaching, curriculum, learning, knowledge, tracking, financial management, marketing, analytics, and other capabilities.
• We are already underway, operating a large geographic area with multiple Coaches.

column3: '>THE FUNDS WILL BE USED TO EXPAND AND TRANSFORM LIVES.

column1: The money we raise through this IndieGoGo campaign will be used to increase our ability and infrastructure to transform lives and businesses.

Your contribution will be used to help us get started, expanding on what we have already built. BrightCoach will eventually become a profit making business, as we continue to invest our profits into growing and expanding our organization.
If we don't make our goal, we will continue to build BrightCoach as described, only slower.

column3: '>We are truly very grateful to you for considering a financial contribution, so we have worked to offer you unique and exciting incentives and thankyous' for contributing, in line with our mission to change lives. We hope the level of contribution you choose, provides you a gift that will transform your thinking and your life.
'>A drawing for A Trip to Bali (!!) to find yourself, develop your consciousness, and immerse yourself in a unique, once-in-a-lifetime culture,
'>Several options for one-on-one Coaching sessions with a BrightCoach so you can experience the transformative power of Coaching for yourself,
'>Options for several highly impactful downloads or personality profiles that you will use to create enlightenment, new knowledege and understanding of yourself, and personal development.
'>Stunning, limited run tee shirts that you can proudly wear proclaiming you were there from the beginning.

column1: BrightCoach is founded and lead by Peter Ashworth, a vibrant, high-energy, successful entrepreneur and innovator, who has previously founded 4 successful businesses, and worked as a CEO and executive in several large companies. In addition to being our CEO, he is a practicing Executive and Life Coach, working with people and business execs on several continents. He is extremely passionate about helping others, and creating new sparks in peoples lives, that might catch on to change the world in millions of ways.

He has 30+ years experience in brand-building and marketing, expertise in data and intelligent technologies,  has worked in multiple countries, has lead executive teams in several highly competitive industries, and is very excited about new ideas,innovation and positively changing the world. He is a fervent student of new knowledge about life change, and also has a great story, from overcoming adversity to enlightenment and giving back.
Over the past year, we have developed a unique Coaching Platform. This combines today’s latest science of change within structured, personalized Business and Life Coaching programs.

Although we are a young company, we are already having significant success through our new approach - helping people through difficult career and life challenges, discovering life purpose for those who are lost, helping entrepreneurs and CEO’s build better performing businesses, and expertly coaching people every day to help them become the person they want to be.

column2: >Over the next 3 years, we will train and license over 1,000 BrightCoaches, each of whom will work daily, one-on-one, transforming people and businesses.

column1: BrightCoach helps individuals find their personal vision, determine best path to a rich and meaningful life, then craft a personalized coaching process towards removing barriers and creating personal life change.

BrightCoach Executive Business Coaching develops personal leadership potential, substantially improves executive business capabilities and individual development, and puts individuals on a fast track to performance achievement – based on key business goals. This happens through our world class curriculum and teaching methodologies, both one-on-one and peer group Coaching.

Every one of us has a unique gift, but most people will never realize their true potential or purpose. The BrightCoach one-on-one Coaching method provides a carefully developed framework to help individuals and business people live their dreams and achieve their goals, no matter their background, past, age, education, beliefs or culture. Our process works for every person, and every business.
BrightCoach is built to do only one thing: to transform lives.
Every element in our organization is designed and developed to positively change the lives of people, and small, medium, and large businesses through expert Life and Executive Business Coaching.
Coaching is proven to change lives and increase business performance.

column2: >Of all companies and individuals who hire a coach are ""somewhat"" or ""very"" satisfied.
>State that Coaching generates learning and clarity for forward action with a commitment to measurable outcomes.
>Professional coaching maximizes personal potential and unlocks latent sources of productivity.
>Coaching creates both personal and business satisfaction, engagement and happiness.
>ICF Global Coaching Client Study was conducted independently by PriceWaterhouseCoopers.

column1: OUR TALENTED TEAM + THE BRILLIANT MINDS WE HAVEN'T YET MET.

BrightCoach people are extraordinary. We currently have 16 talented support people and Coaches, but with your generous contribution, we will expand our talent to include bright executives and associates in the areas of operations, marketing, finance, media, training, technology, human development, and of course finding and training amazing BrightCoaches to expand our reach.

We believe that giving back to people and planet is our responsibility and a competitive differentiator. We pledge 1% of our sales to help organizations and important issues on our planet. We are deeply committed to social responsibility — to creating better lives for millions, acting responsibly, operating sustainably, and contributing to the communities and causes in which we work, live and impact.

BrightCoach will rely on the current trend of personal Business and Life Coaching to continue, but sees no reason it won't. We will need to stay innovative and performance-driven in all elements, as we realize we will have competition who will attempt to imitate our model. We must stay focused on achieving the needs of our clients first and foremost, above all else, and creating strong social and word-of-mouth referrals through doing excellent work. And finally, we must create a unique culture that allows us to attract the brightest minds and greatest talent to work with BrightCoach.
BrightCoach is a bold, big idea that will positively impact the lives of millions in cities, towns and rural areas across the planet.
You have a chance to be a part of creating this legacy. Your contribution will start a movement for the good of others, and you will always be able to say - ""I was there from the beginning.""
Come join us on an amazing journey.
If you are not able to help financially, it does not mean you can't be a part of our journey.
• PLEASE - help us send this campaign on to others to get the word out and make some noise about BrightCoach, and our Indiegogo campaign.
• Post this campaign to your social media pages.
• Use the Indiegogo share tools to share this campaign with your friends and family on email, or social media!
BrightCoach is a proven, science-based Business and Life Coaching organization, already helping people and businesses transform lives, and improve business performance.
We will help over 1,000,000 people in the US and across the world over the next decade, create personal success and move them from where they are - to where they want to be.
What if you were able to reimagine improving the lives of millions of people?

BrightCoach works closely with both personal and business clients in a unique one-on-one Coaching relationship to create positive change, find their purpose, develop leadership skills, build consciousness, active self-discovery and extraordinary results in their lives, careers, businesses or organizations.
THE BENEFITS OF WORKING WITH BRIGHTCOACH:
Transform Your Life or Business to Where You Want it to be
Discover Your Personal Values and Passion
Get Clarity on Life's Big Issues
WE WILL TRANSFORM ONE MILLION LIVES + BUSINESSES.
To help people create extraordinary lives and businesses.
We will help 1,000,000 individuals and business leaders across the world, maximize their potential to become extraordinary and live their best life.
We have spent the last year building BrightCoach.
We have developed a very competitive ramp-up and expansion strategy that will allow BrightCoach to expand into cities, towns and rural areas across the US, and other parts of the world.
We have determined the infrastructure, resources, people, brand, technologies, performance and path we need to be successful.
We have developed a world-class brand, and BrightCoach culture that will work in all countries, demographics, and cultures.
We have created the industry's most sophisticated marketing capabilities.

We have created our proprietary BrightCoach platform that incorporates all elements of Coaching, curriculum, learning, knowledge, tracking, financial management, marketing, analytics, and other capabilities.
We are already underway, operating a large geographic area with multiple Coaches.
THE FUNDS WILL BE USED TO EXPAND AND TRANSFORM LIVES.
The money we raise through this IndieGoGo campaign will be used to increase our ability and infrastructure to transform lives and businesses.

Your contribution will be used to help us get started, expanding on what we have already built. BrightCoach will eventually become a profit making business, as we continue to invest our profits into growing and expanding our organization.
If we don't make our goal, we will continue to build BrightCoach as described, only slower.

We are truly very grateful to you for considering a financial contribution, so we have worked to offer you unique and exciting incentives and thankyous' for contributing, in line with our mission to change lives. We hope the level of contribution you choose, provides you a gift that will transform your thinking and your life.
A drawing for A Trip to Bali (!!) to find yourself, develop your consciousness, and immerse yourself in a unique, once-in-a-lifetime culture,
Several options for one-on-one Coaching sessions with a BrightCoach so you can experience the transformative power of Coaching for yourself,
Options for several highly impactful downloads or personality profiles that you will use to create enlightenment, new knowledege and understanding of yourself, and personal development.
Stunning, limited run tee shirts that you can proudly wear proclaiming you were there from the beginning.
Every one of our perks has been carefully created to have maximum transformation capabilities. We truly hope that you experience a Coaching session or two. It will change your life.
Think of your contribution to BrightCoach as an investment in your future - and the future of millions, just like you.

Be a Part of the Change

In 2015, over 35 000 dogs were taken in by Canadian shelters (CFHS, 2015). Thanks to the men and women who devote themselves everyday to helping dogs and other animals in need, around half of them found loving homes to be a part of. While impressive, there are still so many deserving dogs, all trying to find their forever home. 

We want to further improve upon the efforts of shelters and rescues in Ontario by collaborating with them and changing the way people interact with adoptable dogs. Our concept differs from traditional adoption methods (and cafes) in that people are invited to come in and enjoy the company of numerous adoptable dogs in a safe, open and playful environment. We want to reinvent the way people interact with rescue dogs.

Do I need to adopt a dog to visit the cafe?

Of course not! Although one of our main aims is to connect deserving dogs with loving families, we understand not everyone has the time or resources to care for a dog of their own. This cafe will be for them too.

What Your Dollars Will Do

With unique ideas, come unique challenges.

From following Ontario’s strict health and safety regulations to creating a suitable environment in order to accommodate numerous dogs, a lot of planning has already gone into this cafe. The funds we raise will go directly to opening the cafe. Specifically:

Renovations: creating a suitable, yet playful environment for the dogs and customers will require the majority of the funds and is of the utmost importance to us.

Licenses/Permits: purchasing building permits, food licenses, employer costs

Cafe and Dog Supplies: while not exceedingly expensive, cafe equipment, dog toys and sanitation supplies are all essential to creating a superior dog cafe experience.

 

Concept

Imagine. Entering a cafe and immediately being surrounded by loving dogs, all yearning for your attention. We've worked tirelessly to create a space that is both dog-friendly, but also provides the customer with a memorable cafe experience.

Our vested interested in the cafe and past professional experience has led us to create a detailed plan of what we aim to create with your generous contributions. Additionally, we have been in contact with several dog trainers and experts in the region to create an ideal space.

Main Floor
column2:
/>   

 

 

Fencing: in accordance with Toronto Public Health regulations, a clear division between animals and where food/drink are handled is crucial.

Quiet space: should the dogs encounter a stressful situation, they have a place to retreat and relax

Sanitation stations: to prevent the spread of germs/bacteria

These are some of the measures we have thought of, in order to ensure the well-being of customers and the dogs.

 

Secondary Floor

 

Incentives

Along with the satisfaction of knowing you made a difference in the lives of dogs from all over Ontario, we are proud to offer our backers a variety of exclusive perks. All shipping within Canada is free, but international charges will apply to shipments outside of Canada.

 

The Cafe

Along with the dog portion of the project, we are committed to providing an equally strong coffee program. Along with a variety of baked goods and other beverages, only the finest coffee will be served, provided by Rescue Coffee Co.

Rescue Coffee Co. is a grassroots Canadian company that is committed to enriching the lives of humans and dogs by offering only Premium Fair-Trade Organic coffee beans. Additionally, 10% of all their proceeds go towards local dog rescues.
column3:
>The Team

 Janio Alexander Valencia

Dogs have always been an important part of Alex’s life, having grown up with them his entire life. While living in Mexico, he had the memorable experience of rescuing several dogs, including a Rottweiler and Pit Bull, both usually considered to be more demanding dog breeds. He believes dogs behave according to their owners.

 

 

 Björn Frehe

As a longtime animal lover, he too has grown up surrounded by animals. His first introduction to the world of animal cafes came while working abroad in South Korea. While the concept amazed him, he knew the concept itself could be improved upon by creating a model that benefited dogs in need, as well as the customer.

 

In such a beautiful and diverse city, let´s continue to provide compassionate and unique experiences to the people of Toronto!

www.wishbonecafe.com

column1: The Uptown Dog House will be the only doggy daycare located in the Uptown area of Minneapolis, MN.  Its modern facility with a rooftop dog play area will provide a convenient, welcoming and comfortable home away from home for dogs
column2: allowing their owner to feel at ease when they drop off their best friend for a day of play while they are at work.  The company’s commitment to social responsibility will be evident in all that they do - from the offering of living wages to its staff, to a job training program for at-risk youth and eventually other individuals who historically have had a difficult time accessing and maintaining employment, to the offering of locally made retail products such as Real Biscuits for Real Dogs – dog treats made by young people with disabilities, with proceeds supporting Minnesota Life College’s vocational training program.

column1: The mission of The Uptown Dog House is to be THE go-to doggy daycare for dog owners who live/work in or near the Uptown area of Minneapolis due to our welcoming atmosphere, our safe and fun environment for dogs to socialize, and our commitment to social responsibility.  The Uptown Dog House is a doggy daycare that does good.

Melissa has a BS in Human Development and an MA in School Counseling. Prior to completing her Bachelor degree, Melissa worked for 9 years as the Office Manager at a hair salon in Minneapolis, MN, and assisted the owner in the opening and management of a second location in Los Angeles, CA.  After returning to Minneapolis, she worked as the Office Manager and Access and Outreach Coordinator at a local non-profit organization.   Melissa then completed her Master's Degree and has worked worked as a School Counselor at an alternative high school for the past 6 years.

The at-risk students that attended the school were the exact population that she wanted to work with.  However, after several years as a School Counselor, she also learned that working in the bureaucratic school system was not for her.  At the same time, Melissa realized the need for a doggy daycare in the Uptown area of Minneapolis for her energetic dog, Winnie.  She envisioned a modern doggy daycare with a rooftop dog play area to go along with the many rooftop patios that were popping up in Uptown.

As a School Counselor, Melissa also saw the need for job training opportunities for youth that often struggle to attain and maintain a job with a livable wage.  Social responsibility and engagement in the community is something that has always been an important part of Melissa’s life, and will also be an important part of The Uptown Dog House.

I completed an 18-week business plan class through Women Venture where I wrote a comprehensive business plan including financials (contact me if you want me to email you copy of the full business plan).  I will be looking for a 5000-7000 square foot location.  The majority of the start-up funding will be used for the renovations of the space.

My fundraising goal of $25,000  is  just a portion of the projected startup costs. The rest of the funding will be acquired through bank loans and investors.  The full start-up funding needs are broken down here:

Building Renovations - $400,000
Furniture/Equipment - $10,000
Pre-open payroll - $15,000
Rent Deposits - $12,000
Other misc. startup costs - $6,300
TOTAL - $500,000
FREE Water Bottle with any contribution of $50 or more!
FREE tank/tee with any contribution of $100 or more!
Starting a business is always risky, but I am prepared to rise to the challenge!

Funding: The start-up costs needed to get The Uptown Dog House up and running are significant.  This Indiegogo campaign will be a great start to get us on our way!  I am confident that with the large network of people I know, my excellent credit history and my dedication to making this happen, I will be able to come up with the additional funding through loans and/or investors.

Finding the perfect space: Currently the city of Minneapolis says that doggy daycare's fall within ""dog kennel"" zoning, which means that we will need to find an industrial zoned space.  In Uptown, these are generally the buildings located along the greenway.  This limits the possibilities for spaces to rent, but we WILL find the perfect space!

*Even if I am unable to meet my goal of $25,000, I will use the money that I do receive to help in getting a business loan.  If in the end I am unable to get enough loans and am unable to move forward with The Uptown Dog House, all contributions will be returned to you.

Any contribution is greatly appreciated. Contribute whatever amount you can, and remember, contributing is not the only way you can help us meet our goal! Use the Indiegogo share tools and share our page via email and social media.

column2: >In short, the plan is to establish a variety retail business (based upon market intelligence gathered) in a very under-utilized location I found, the Factory in Farmington.  This location has a history of high customer traffic (when it was fully occupied) and is perfectly situated within the trade area, making it prime for further development as a boutique mall.
column3: >It is the only multi-tenant building within the area that allows customers to visit different retail outlets without being exposed to the weather.  The location also offers low fixed rents (utilities included) and no CAM fees, making it superior to the other rental options available which cost up to 3 times more for rents/utilities.
column4: >This business will allow me the flexibility to continue to care for my mother while also meeting my financial obligations and being an active productive member of society.
column6: >It is expected to take 8 - 10 weeks, from the time funding is secured, for the business to be open and operational.
column7: >Order placement and delivery of initial inventory is expected to be accomplished within the first 6-weeks.  Once inventory is on-site, it is anticipated to take 10 – 14 days to properly record and merchandise all products.
column8: >Approximately $11k is allocated for leasehold improvements.  These improvements will include installation of floor covering, slat wall, painting, and other minor renovations.  The timeline on completing these renovations is 3 weeks and a significant portion of the work will be done by management, friends, and family.
column9: >The only other substantial start-up expense, other than opening inventory, will be for fixtures and equipment.  This expense will include the purchase of POS system, sales counters, store displays and accessories.

","The Plan:In short, the plan is to establish a variety retail business (based upon market intelligence gathered) in a very under-utilized location I found, the Factory in Farmington.  This location has a history of high customer traffic (when it was fully occupied) and is perfectly situated within the trade area, making it prime for further development as a boutique mall. It is the only multi-tenant building within the area that allows customers to visit different retail outlets without being exposed to the weather.  The location also offers low fixed rents (utilities included) and no CAM fees, making it superior to the other rental options available which cost up to 3 times more for rents/utilities. This business will allow me the flexibility to continue to care for my mother while also meeting my financial obligations and being an active productive member of society.Timeline / Financial NeedIt is expected to take 8 - 10 weeks, from the time funding is secured, for the business to be open and operational. Order placement and delivery of initial inventory is expected to be accomplished within the first 6-weeks.  Once inventory is on-site, it is anticipated to take 10 – 14 days to properly record and merchandise all products.Approximately $11k is allocated for leasehold improvements.  These improvements will include installation of floor covering, slat wall, painting, and other minor renovations.  The timeline on completing these renovations is 3 weeks and a significant portion of the work will be done by management, friends, and family.The only other substantial start-up expense, other than opening inventory, will be for fixtures and equipment.  This expense will include the purchase of POS system, sales counters, store displays and accessories.  Approximate Timeline Startup Costs If the funding goals of this campaign are not reached, all funds received will be applied to continuing efforts to establish this business.Perks for Supporters (What's in it for you)In addition to the satisfaction you will receive from directly assisting a disabled veteran, as a THANK YOU to all that support this venture, I can offer some terrific perks:$25 - Set of three Artisan Crafted Bath BombsWhether you are seeking a relaxing soak or an invigorating explosion of color and scent, these bath bombs are perfect for every bathing experience. Simply drop one of our 4.5 oz fizzy bath bombs into a tub filled with water and settle in for an exquisite sensory experience.$50 - Matching set of Artisan Crafted Bath & Body productsThis set includes:One 8 oz Bottle - Ultra Moisturizing Lotion,One 8 oz Bottle - Fine Fragrance Mist, andOne 12 oz Bottle - Luxurious Bath & Shower GelWe guarantee 100% premium quality. We can make that claim because we use only the highest quality ingredients to make our crafted line of products.$75 - Deluxe Bath /Body CollectionThis deluxe collection includes:Three Artisan Crafted Bath BombsOne 8 oz Bottle - Ultra Moisturizing Lotion,One 8 oz Bottle - Fine Fragrance Mist, andOne 12 oz Bottle - Luxurious Bath & Shower GelWe guarantee 100% premium quality.$100 - Optimum Bath/Body CollectionThis collection will include:Three Artisan Crafted Bath Bombs,One 8 oz Ultra Moisturizing Lotion,One 8 oz Fine Fragrance Mist,One 12 oz Bath/Shower Gel, andyour choice of TWO additional bath & body productsAll with our 100% premium ingredient guarantee!$125 – Custom Crafted Medium Gift BasketThis gorgeous basket (14.25"" x 9.5"" x 6.25"") will come to you gift ready (card included), with your choice of content. Each basket is individually crafted with care and cello-wrapped to make it a truly unforgettable present for the one you love.$175 - Large Custom Crafted Gift BasketThis gorgeous basket (15 dia in x 9.5"") will come to you gift ready (card included), with your choice of content. Each basket is individually crafted with care and cello-wrapped to make it a truly unforgettable present for the one you love.Impact:Your support of this project directly assists a disabled veteran and his family.Being raised as a military dependent, the largest support structure helping me to cope with the challenges that arose from repeatedly relocating, changing schools, losing/making friends, etc. was family.  This instilled in me a very deep appreciation of them and is what fuels my obligation to care for my ailing mother, as well as my own children (age 9 & 11).  Unfortunately, due to the need to be available and flexible, this limits my ability to obtain standard employment.Your help with this project will allow me to be an active productive member of society and establish a means of income, while still being able to physically care for my mother and financially care for my children. Other Ways You Can Help:I know not everyone can contribute money to this campaign and I completely understand that. That being said, there are a few other ways you can help:

Supporting the project of giving hope to Palestinian women
Meaning of ( Blessed land )for embroidery and handicrafts

column2:
>In the hands of Palestinian women Embroidery new creative spiritIt gives touches employment opportunities for women in the Palestinian villages to help them find a source of income and address poverty and unemployment project, as the project maintains a Palestinian cultural heritage that is trying to smear the Israeli occupation.
 Women's groups from Palestine, I began to think about a creative project to cope with unemployment and help children and their families through the production of hand-embroideries and marketed in countries across the website.Donation idea to become a reality on the ground.In  Palestine This is for achieving some of our targets and participating in the bringing up of our society.

><strong>To start, Palestine has a special level in the field of education in the Arab World, the percentage of knowledge of reading and writing reaches to 99%. Also  people are intelligent from the innovative side, everyone has his smart phone. But the most challenging thing in this case is the unemployment
column3: its percentage reaches 50%. Because of that we started to search for smart idea to set up our own business. We use technology and marketing via internet all over the world.

column2: >The idea of our project is making Palestinian embroidery manually or automatically and marketing them via internet all over the world and for who like this embroidery. It is worth mentioning that Palestinian embroidery taking a special international increased importance. foreign and Palestinian traders and institution work on promoting this embroidery and the demand increasing everyday on this industries for the importance of them .this embroidery refer to the age of Canaanites and represent to the Palestinians and the solidarity a symbol from the symbols of the Palestinian history . Also it shows how they are connected to their land and gives them a glitter of hope to come back to their homeland. We really started in showing a part of these products on a number of customers outside Palestine and we found that we have the ability to reach for more numbers of customers.

> 
Embroidery is one of the most prominent folk art link between past and present, where embroidery system in terms of the distribution of colors and patterns, have increased during the past years pictures wearing Palestinian Popular fashion in cities and motivated to maintain the heritage that Israel is trying to smear and remove him from the Palestinian people to lose one strong evidence his presence on the land of Palestine for thousands of years.Embroidery various forms characteristic of the Palestinian people and is part of the national heritage, social and logo, but it's the special features that characterize the Palestinian people from other peoples, especially as it is stitching his clothes himself and methods traditionally used a needle and thread and which need to be patience and endurance, but that this the craft has been handed down from grandparents to children and grandchildren, through the preservation of the method and style of embroidery, and special workshops that are mostly indoors, specifically in scattered in all the Palestinian territories, refugee camps.It includes embroidered garments of all shapes and colors mismatch jackets, shawls, vests, blankets and pillows, dresses and scarves, sheets of different sizes. And embroidery schools and trends vary from one place to another in terms of design and color yarn used or embroidered manner of spaces and, to the extent that the person knows the area or village or city of his robe.
>1- A chance for a lot of youth to start their own business and open the doors for their future
>2- The decline of unemployment percentage and marketing local products for the sake of the society.
> 3- Creating work opportunities for housewives who work in the manual embroidery.
>4- The use of technology in marketing all over the world
>5- Spreading the Palestinian heritage and embroidery which represent the symbol of Canaanites culture
>6- Providing these products for who need them, they have a good demand

>1- Raw materials (cloth, wool and embroidery and spinning tools.)  (1200 $)
2- Machines for automated embroidery (every machine worths 600 $).
  We need 1 ones
*the total project budget 2000 $

I have spent 6 years dedicating the success of my career in the military, to fitness. As a NCO in the US Army Infantry, rigorous training is directly supported by an equally rigorous passion for fitness.

• I am Army Sgt Spencer Livesay. I was driven deeper into fitness by my MOS. I was fortunate enough to train various physical training events. Combining both a passion for fitness, and desire to help others succeed in this area, is the only goal I have left in life.
• I am raising money to open the first location, and pursue my dream.

• Outside of obviously helping to further my love of health and fitness, you would also contribute to those with the same passion, but not quite as knowledgeable in the field yet. This would enable us to interact and accelerate their results.
Break it down for folks in more detail:

• I need $200,000 total funds to open this location. $156,000 covers everything on the Nutrishop side, from $70,000 inventory, to complete interior build out of the store, and signage on the outside. the remaining $36,000 covers a required year lease paid in full, upfront.

• I don't plan to stop at one location, however this is the immediate focus. To all investors, I will expect you to link over to my facebook, send me a message about your investment, and gain my personal contact information. This will enable me to offer advice, lifetime discounts on every product I sell, and national shipping to get those products to you!

• If I don't reach my entire goal, funds raised will at least serve as collateral in obtaining a traditional source of funding. Which I have been attempting to receive, while talking to more lenders than I knew existed. I will also run a secondary campaign, to continue raising funds, until I am able to step forward into this dream.
Feel free to explain more about your campaign and let people know the difference their contribution will make:

• Fitness builds confidence, and confidence sparks creativity, courage to pursue goals, and a positive energy shared to everyone around you. I personally feel that by allowing yourself to accomplish hard set goals, you manifest a world around you, where anything is possible.

• I desire to work along side, personally, no matter how many stores I end up opening, because I am here to help others. I want my success, to reach out to more people to help them achieve their own. I want to drive your fitness goals to fruition, along side of you.
People value your transparency. Be open and stand out by providing insight into the risks and obstacles you may face on the way to achieving your goal.

• The unequivocal drive to establish success, and to work hard, no matter the consequences or sacrifices, has been some of the core values that have molded and shaped my life over the last several years. The pure discipline that governs my thoughts and actions, has structured a possibility for success. I don't need help working, I need help to be given the opportunity to work. To pour my soul into a project, and see it grow from nothing, is what will help me to maintain a positive outlook through this entire process. When doors have been slammed in my face, and I have been told to ""kick rocks"", I haven't allowed any of it to diminish my determination. I continuously walk in to the next potential investor with the exact same, defiant mind set, that despite what anyone says, I will eventually make this happen.

• There is an amazing structure in place with this opportunity. One on one advising, step by step guidance from license purchase to opening day, a community of other franchisees within the surrounding areas, and a complete itemization of full start up costs, projected over head on a 12 month and then 2 year profit and loss sheet. All of this has given a complete financial layout of what's ahead. Which also enables preparation for these hurdles. One thing we instill in all of our soldiers in the Army, is to have a PACE plan. Primary, alternate, contingency, and emergency plan. A series of fail safes to cover any potential set backs.
Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

• I understand that not everyone is able to donate, but you can always help by using your network to extend the word about this project. Putting positive energy out into the universe, will one day come back to you 10 fold, and just spreading the word, could encourage someone to become proactive about their own fitness journey! Even just reaching out to me personally and offering encouragement, can help me continue to stay positive and focused!

• Of course, don't forget to use the indiegogo share tools to spread the word. I sincerely look forward to one day working within a network of people, striving towards bettering their life, and the world around us. Thank you all so much!

Hi and Thank You for Checking out our Campaign!

I'm Aunyx. Founder of Amenta's Key, Mompreneur + Phoenix in the Making.

I made my first batch of soap almost 15 years ago with my best friend.

My husband and I started Amenta's Key back in 2014 with $300.
$100 for our business license
$150 worth of ingredients (mostly olive oil)
and
$50 worth of miscellaneous supplies like plastic mixing containers, safety goggles and gloves.
No advertising budget. No fancy website. And certainly no clue how we were going to make it work.

But as fate would have it, word of mouth spread fast.

Month 1, we entered the American Small Business Championship hosted by Score and to our surprise, WON! This helped build momentum and spread the word even faster.

We had an opportunity to pitch to the sharks, and I made the call to hang back and wait til we worked through some kinks in the business. I don't regret the decision. I knew we weren't ready for national exposure at the time, but we are now. Take a look at the states we've served so far...

Through the years we've been spending our efforts learning and building. Consistently researching and slowly but steadily growing. It's paid off. We have an amazing product and we aren't the only ones that think so...
column2:
>

We've also scored some pretty sweet features... Feel free to check them out.

http://bridaltribe.com/awesome-bridesmaid-gifts/

and http://bridaltribe.com/editors-quick-pick-gift-guide/

Women Making It Happen 2016 - http://www.lilmssophia.com/2016/08/aunyx-burrel...

https://emmaleebates.com/aunyx-burrell-got-started-natural-skincare/

https://thetreekisser.com/vegan-wedding-guide/wedding-party-proposals/

""Best of Beauty"" Handmade Magazine April 2017 issue page 18

 

And now we've reached the point where we are ready to expand and deliver a brand new Amenta's Key experience! Help carry our mission of self care and self love to another level.

Where the funds will be allocated:

Opening our retail store will open quite a few doors for us and the women we serve. Giving a tailored, interactive and intimate experience. Think of it as a beauty buffet. The front end would be split with an actual bar, where you can mix your own scents. People will not only be able to serve themselves at our beauty bar, they will be able to attend workshops to learn how to formulate their unique aromatherapy blends. There will also be opportunities to receive coaching and mentoring for emerging as leaders within your own rite.

Legal, Licensing, Insurance $2500

3 Months Rent $4500

Remodeling $3300

Stocking Launch Inventory $5000

Equipment $2400

Grand Opening Event $1400

PR, Print and Social Media Advertising $2100

 

This is time sensitive. The property we are looking at is a stand alone building with lawn space where our customers will also be able to harvest their own herbs. It's located in an up and coming neighborhood with a lot of foot traffic. It's a gem that is guaranteed to be off the market as soon as investors become aware of its presence. If we move quickly this will not be an issue, however the longer we wait, the more likely a bigger fish will bite. In the unfortunate event the property is claimed before we can sign the lease, we have two other locations in mind, however they do not have the garden space and are slightly more expensive.

And that's where we need your help! The slow and steady wins, we are extremely grateful for, and have kept us in the race this long, but they're simply not enough to launch into the realm of truly delivering the best possible service to our community. We need to make a move on this property ASAP. As we reach the funding goals for each expense, we will update the campaign with the progress, to keep you guys in the loop. You can also follow us along in our private facebook group where we will be giving live updates. Join here --->
column3:
www.facebook.com/groups/vipamentaskey

The juicy perks you will receive: We have several levels of perks for individuals and our fellow small businesses.

-$5 a Special Thank You Shout Out on Social Media

-$10 a 5oz Aromatherapy Bath Fizzy (aka Bath Bomb)

-$15 a 4oz Luxury Soy Candle Travel Tin

-$25 for a Natural You tShirt

-$29 a Personalized Affirmation Candle from our ""Esteem"" Collection

-$49 for a 7 bar collection of Handmade Artisan Soaps

-$75 for our Lavender Luxe Aromatherapy Spa Kit

-$100 for a $125 Gift Card to our store (that's like saving you a whole week or two worth of gas)

-$500 to become a Stockist and receive a Luxury Starter Pack at discounted wholesale rate and receive a feature in our monthly e-newsletter

-$1000 Displayed Recognition in our Storefront, A Luxe Gift Basket and a feature in our monthly e-newsletter

 

Other Ways You Can Help: Share our story and our campaign. Word of mouth has been our saving grace. Your voice matters!

We're seizing every opportunity to raise the funds for our dream boutique.

We're hosting Pop-Up shops around town and down the East Coast at small businesses to help bring awareness and traffic to their locations. If you would like us to Pop Up at your store, please submit an event proposal request via our website.

Thank You for taking the time to review our campaign, it is greatly appreciated. We each have the power to make the change we want to see in this world. We only need to take action. You can make a huge impact simply by making a small contribution to our campaign. We'll do a happy dance and when you receive your perks, you will too!

If we move quickly this will not be an issue, however the longer we wait, the more likely a bigger fish will bite. In the unfortunate event the property is claimed before we can sign the lease, we have two other locations in mind, however they do not have the garden space and are slightly more expensive.And that's where we need your help! The slow and steady wins, we are extremely grateful for, and have kept us in the race this long, but they're simply not enough to launch into the realm of truly delivering the best possible service to our community. We need to make a move on this property ASAP. As we reach the funding goals for each expense, we will update the campaign with the progress, to keep you guys in the loop. You can also follow us along in our private facebook group where we will be giving live updates. Join here ---> www.facebook.com/groups/vipamentaskey The juicy perks you will receive: We have several levels of perks for individuals and our fellow small businesses.-$5 a Special Thank You Shout Out on Social Media -$10 a 5oz Aromatherapy Bath Fizzy (aka Bath Bomb)-$15 a 4oz Luxury Soy Candle Travel Tin-$25 for a Natural You tShirt-$29 a Personalized Affirmation Candle from our ""Esteem"" Collection-$49 for a 7 bar collection of Handmade Artisan Soaps-$75 for our Lavender Luxe Aromatherapy Spa Kit-$100 for a $125 Gift Card to our store (that's like saving you a whole week or two worth of gas)-$500 to become a Stockist and receive a Luxury Starter Pack at discounted wholesale rate and receive a feature in our monthly e-newsletter -$1000 Displayed Recognition in our Storefront, A Luxe Gift Basket and a feature in our monthly e-newsletter Other Ways You Can Help: Share our story and our campaign. Word of mouth has been our saving grace. Your voice matters!We're seizing every opportunity to raise the funds for our dream boutique.We're hosting Pop-Up shops around town and down the East Coast at small businesses to help bring awareness and traffic to their locations. If you would like us to Pop Up at your store, please submit an event proposal request via our website.Thank You for taking the time to review our campaign, it is greatly appreciated. We each have the power to make the change we want to see in this world. We only need to take action. You can make a huge impact simply by making a small contribution to our campaign. We'll do a happy dance and when you receive your perks, you will too!",6.0,0,"1 Campaign

column1:
Depuis bientôt un an, l’équipe du Rond-Point travaille à mettre sur pied un café à vocation sociale dans le quartier Hochelaga-Maisonneuve. L’idée de construire un espace collectif et inclusif dans un quartier aussi effervescent que Hochelaga-Maisonneuve a rassemblé les trois membres fondatrices autour de ce projet mixant restauration, organisation sociale et activités socioculturelles.
 
Le rond-point, café autogéré est une coopérative de travail qui sera située dans l’Ouest du quartier Hochelaga-Maisonneuve, sur l’artère commerciale de la rue Ontario. Ce café à vocation sociale aura comme mission d’offrir un rapport qualité-prix intéressant de boissons et de nourriture, une salle multimédia en location et surtout une implication réelle dans le quartier. Sa collaboration avec les organismes du quartier permettra de centraliser les informations les concernant ainsi que les services offerts dans le quartier, en plus d’offrir des ateliers de différentes natures répondant aux multiples champs d'intérêt de toutes les résidentes et de tous les résidents du quartier et ceux des alentours.
 
Une salle de réunion sera offerte pour les organismes, les entreprises et les travailleurs et travailleuses autonomes, dans une formule tout inclus comprenant boissons, nourriture et service multimédia. Il sera alors possible de tenir des réunions en toute tranquillité d’esprit, et de répondre à toutes les demandes avec notre installation comprenant un projecteur, un écran, un téléphone-conférence, une webcam et un système de vidéoconférence ainsi qu’un service professionnel et adapté. Le café sera à l’image du quartier, ce qui se traduit par une mixité sociale inclusive, et s’établira dans ses quartiers au courant de l'année 2017.
 
Nous mettrons l'espace du café à la disposition des initiatives citoyennes en tout genre, soit sous forme de prêt ou de location, selon les événements et les besoins. Ce que nous voulons, c’est encourager la réappropriation des lieux par la clientèle du café en permettant aux artistes d'exposer, d'offrir des spectacles et des performances ainsi que promouvoir les projets citoyens. Il s’agit d’offrir un espace convivial et inclusif pour que tous les types de clientèle s'y sentent les bienvenus, tout en étant sécuritaire pour les familles.
 
Nous espérons que vous voyez, tout comme nous,  les merveilleuses opportunités qu’un projet comme celui-ci apportera au quartier Hochelaga-Maisonneuve!

Ce dont nous avons besoin!
Les coûts de démarrage sont évalués à 130 000$ et avec cette campagne de sociofinancement nous aimerions ramasser 20 000$ pour financer une partie du projet.

Comment allons-nous financer le projet?
Nos sources de revenus proviendront de trois sources différentes: les subventions, la campagne de sociofinancement et les prêts. Nous avons déjà amassé, via des subventions, 10 000$ à ce jour!
 
Où ira l'argent que nous ramasserons?
L'argent amassé permettra:
<li>D’aménager l’espace du café afin d'offrir un endroit sécuritaire et chaleureux pour toutes et tous
<li>D’aménager la salle multimédia afin de la rendre le plus fonctionnelle possible
<li>D’imprimer des outils d’information sur les organismes communautaires et les services offerts dans le quartier
• D’organiser plusieurs activités à faible coût pour les gens en situation précaire du quartier Hochelaga-Maisonneuve.

For nearly a year, the Rond-Point (“Roundabout”) team has been at work setting up a social café in the Hochelaga-Maisonneuve neighborhood. The idea of ​​building up a collective and inclusive space in a neighborhood as effervescent as Hochelaga-Maisonneuve brought together the three founding members around this project that is mixing a restaurant, social organizing and socio-cultural activities.

The Rond-Point, a self-managed café, is a working co-operative located in the west end of Hochelaga-Maisonneuve, on commercial Ontario Street. The purpose of this social café will be to offer good value for money on drinks and food, a multimedia room available for rent and, especially, some real involvement in the neighborhood. Its collaboration with the community’s organizations will enable a gathering of information concerning these and the services offered in the vicinity, in addition to an offer of various workshops on multiple subjects of interest to all residents of the neighborhood.

A meeting room will also be offered for organizations, businesses and self-employed workers in a package deal including beverages, food and multimedia tools. It will then be possible to hold meetings there with peace of mind and to suit all needs thanks to our installation that will be including a projector, a screen, a phone conference system, a webcam and a videoconferencing system as well as professional, adapted tech support. The café will reflect Hochelaga-Maisonneuve’s image, which translates into an inclusive social mix, and will be established in the neighborhood in 2017.

We will make café space available for citizens’ initiatives of all kinds, either in the form of loans or leases depending on events and needs. We want to encourage the reappropriation of the space by the café’s clientele by allowing artists to exhibit, to plan shows and performances as well as to promote projects from residents. It’s about offering a friendly and inclusive space so that all types of clientele feel welcome, while being safe for families too.
We hope that like us, you can see all the wonderful opportunities a project like this will bring to the Hochelaga-Maisonneuve neighborhood!
The start-up costs are estimated at $130,000 and with this crowdfunding campaign, we would like to raise $20,000 to fund part of the project.
We will have three different sources of income: grants, the crowdfunding campaign, and loans.
<li>Develop café space in order to provide a safe and welcoming place for everyone
<li>Arrange the multimedia room in order to make it as functional as possible
<li>Print information tools about community organizations and neighborhood services
• Organize several low-cost activities for people in precarious situations in the Hochelaga-Maisonneuve neighborhood.
$20: snack including coffee and a mystery grilled cheese
$40: snack for two including two coffees and two mystery grilled cheeses
$50: happy hour for two including two glasses of beer and an appetizer plate to share
$75: Rond-Point tote bag and a happy hour for two including two glasses of beer and an appetizer plate to share
$100: Happy hour formula, including a pitcher of beer or a bottle of wine, an appetizer plate and a Rond-Point tote bag
$500: You become an honorary member and a range of surprises await you!
For any tranche of $10: a hot beverage

On peut faire tellement de choses délicieuses avec des œufs ! des omelettes aux champignons, des gâteaux au chocolat, de la mayonnaise…
Et en plus de garnir nos assiettes, les œufs pourraient avoir le pouvoir de changer ma vie ! 

En effet, à Natitingou, la ville du Nord du Bénin où je vis, on manque d’œufs car la population augmente trop vite et les approvisionnements ne suivent pas.
Alors que moi, Assiba Sylvie Yeropa, bientôt 30 ans, bien que diplômée en agriculture tropicale avec de l’expérience dans le secteur de l’élevage, je ne trouve pas de travail.
Avec mon projet ""l’œuf et la poule"", je souhaite donc mettre en application mes compétences techniques agricoles et saisir l’opportunité commerciale qui existe localement.  Grâce à ma formation et mes précédentes expériences professionnelles, je maîtrise toutes les techniques pour développer un élevage de poules pondeuses avec un bon rendement. Les œufs trouveront leurs débouchés en local auprès des professionnels de la restauration. Et cet emploi me permettra d’avoir des revenus stables pour nourrir et éduquer mes 3 enfants.

Malgré la robustesse du projet et ma détermination, je rencontre une difficulté de taille pour démarrer cette entreprise : j’ai besoin de fonds. Des fonds pour remplir les obligations administratives, pour acheter le terrain et construire un poulailler sécurisé et aéré, et pour faire l’acquisition de ses résidentes, les vraies stars ce projet, les poules Warren, d’excellentes pondeuses. Et enfin pour me procurer le matériel et la nourriture nécessaires au bien-être de ces dernières. Car plus elles seront heureuses, plus elles pondront !
Mais au Bénin, le système bancaire n’est pas très développé et n’accorde pas de prêts aux particuliers sans garantie. C’est pour cela que je sollicite votre investissement dans ce projet entrepreneurial de développement pérenne et local. 

Le budget de 10 000€ que je cherche à lever me permettra de démarrer mon élevage avec un nombre de poules optimal pour réaliser des économies d’échelles pour une meilleure rentabilité. Si le montant n’est pas atteint, je débuterai tout de même mon activité avec un nombre réduit de volatiles. S’il est dépassé, je pourrai envisager des élevages complémentaires que je maîtrise aussi comme les cailles.  

Pour vous remercier de vos contributions, j’aimerais beaucoup pouvoir vous faire goûter mes œufs mais ils ne supporteront pas un si long voyage… C’est pourquoi les œufs que je ne pourrai vous remettre en contrepartie seront donnés aux 4 orphelinats et au centre pour handicapés de notre ville pour les soulager dans leur budget nourriture. Je propose aussi aux plus importants contributeurs de découvrir la gastronomie africaine grâce à un livre de recettes que vous pourrez réaliser chez vous.  et d’avoir leur nom gravé sur les briques du mur des honneurs du poulailler.

Si vous ne pouvez pas contribuer financièrement, vous pouvez m’aider en en parlant de ce projet autour de vous et sur les réseaux sociaux. Vous pouvez suivre toute l’actualité du projet sur notre page

column2: Head Brewer Samuel Brown worked personally with the city's mayor to get legislation passed to finally bring beer to Seagrove, NC! Now, we are opening the city's first Public House in the heart of Seagrove to kickstart the economic growth alcohol sales will bring, while simlutaneously bringing the highest quality, most unique craft beer to the communinty in a family and pet friendly space.
the beer planned! However, we need some help along the way. Your contributions will help us:

column1: • Secure equipment, and permits to launch our craft beer bar.
• Secure equipment, and permits to begin and support full-scale brewery operation.
• Build out the physical facility for both producing beer and packaging beer.
• Acquire and train both bar and brewery personnel.

Seagrove is a rural community in the heart of North Carolina composed of farmers and ceramic artists. The natural clay deposits in the area created a thriving pottery tradition which developed into a successful industry such, that Seagrove is presently regarded as the pottery capital of the United States. The clay deposits also create a natural filtration system that produce excellent water for brewing.
What We Need &

Opening a brewery that also happens to be a small town's first bar is a big task. Your contributions will ensure that we can bring our dream of Seagrove, North Carolina's first bar and brewery to reality.
GroundLion Founder Glass
GroundLion Founder Ballcap
GroundLion Founder T-Shirts

Engrave Your Name in the Bar

 

Name &

We have poured our hearts and souls into this project. From our collective passion for great beer, to personally helping to legalize alcohol sales in Seagrove, none of this could have been accomplished without the help of people like you.

Thank you for spending your time reading about our passion. If you are unable to donate, no worries! Just please share this campaign with your friends, family and fellow beer drinkers!

Until June 2016, there had not been a single drink served in Seagrove since prohibition. Owner & Head Brewer Samuel Brown worked personally with the city's mayor to get legislation passed to finally bring beer to Seagrove, NC! Now, we are opening the city's first Public House in the heart of Seagrove to kickstart the economic growth alcohol sales will bring, while simlutaneously bringing the highest quality, most unique craft beer to the communinty in a family and pet friendly space.
We already have our building identified & the beer planned! However, we need some help along the way. Your contributions will help us:
Secure equipment, and permits to launch our craft beer bar.
Secure equipment, and permits to begin and support full-scale brewery operation.
Build out the physical facility for both producing beer and packaging beer.
Acquire and train both bar and brewery personnel.

Seagrove is a rural community in the heart of North Carolina composed of farmers and ceramic artists. The natural clay deposits in the area created a thriving pottery tradition which developed into a successful industry such, that Seagrove is presently regarded as the pottery capital of the United States. The clay deposits also create a natural filtration system that produce excellent water for brewing.
What We Need & What You Get

Opening a brewery that also happens to be a small town's first bar is a big task. Your contributions will ensure that we can bring our dream of Seagrove, North Carolina's first bar and brewery to reality.
Engrave Your Name in the Bar Name & Help Brew a Beer

If you are unable to donate, no worries! Just please share this campaign with your friends, family and fellow beer drinkers!",6.0,0,"1 Campaign
Local, fresh, small, original, delicious, organic, humane, homemade with love, and ready to serve YOU!

• Borolos Pizza is a local pizza shop in Santa Rosa, CA. Our pizzas are made with purpose (and in-house, vegan sourdough crust). We believe that pizza is a source of happiness, and you should fuel your happy with quality ingredients. Everyone deserves to eat better pizza. We keep our prices fair, and our food fresh and organic, using humanely raised meats, and local dairy and produce (that Point Reyes Blue on a Pepperoni Pie. You gotta try it).

• We took over Borolos Pizza in January of this year. We are a small business, run by real people. I am a single mother, a veteran, a teacher's daughter, and I am asking for your help. Our first few months have been a roller coaster of a learning curve, with deep failures and amazing success, thank to our die hard fans!

<li>Borolos Pizza needs $25,000 to keep it running. Costs for new equipment and renovations required by local permitting, maintenance of existing equipment, and maintaining the ability to continue sourcing local, and supporting Sonoma County and Northern California businesses are our priorities. Here is some of the equipment and repairs your contribution will fund:<ul>
• We can't wait to share our perks with you! Pizza parties, kind shirts and sweet hats, and your pizza creation on our menu, just to name a few!

<li>If our entire goal is not reached, your contributions will still be put to good use, and kept local! In addition to the most immediate permitting concerns, here are some of the local businesses we source from, and this is where your contributions will go:<ul>
We haven't been doing this long, but we hope to...

• The response that we have received from those of you who have stuck with us on this journey so far is overwhelming. The kind words, the constructive criticism, the shared stories. We want to hear more. We want to be a part of this community in a meaningful way, just as you have come to be a part of ours, whether you know it or not.

• There is too much abundance in CA for anyone to be hungry, and everyone deserves a treat. We hope that we can continue to contribute to our community, including veterans, teachers, children, and those in need in meaningful ways. If this campaign is successful, we hope that you will let us know about opportunities to support the community in ways that are meaningful to you.

• We want to know what we can do to better serve you. Please stop by, pick up the phone, follow us on social media. We are real people. Small business is not just about  the neighbor you support, its about how we can earn your trust and build a stronger community for all of us.
Your contribution is not without risk. I am asking you to take a leap of faith with me. But I promise, we will be holding hands when we jump.
If you can't contribute, we still appreciate your support! Perk number one
column2: for sharing and spreading the word, I will give you a giant hug. Not to brag, but I have been told on occasion I am the best hugger ever. Ask Jason when you see him slinging pies at Hippizzazz(Also, ask him for a cinnamon roll recipe. Totally worth it).

column1: • Spread the word, and share this campaign with your friends!
• Come into the shop and say hi. Let us know you're here. You have no idea the power of a kind word. We'll share stories over garlic knots.

Thank you so incredibly much just for taking the time to check us out. We are incredibly grateful for this journey.

What We Need & What You Get

Borolos Pizza needs $25,000 to keep it running. Costs for new equipment and renovations required by local permitting, maintenance of existing equipment, and maintaining the ability to continue sourcing local, and supporting Sonoma County and Northern California businesses are our priorities. Here is some of the equipment and repairs your contribution will fund:
New Prep sink and updated plumbing
New Refrigerators and work top tables
We can't wait to share our perks with you! Pizza parties, kind shirts and sweet hats, and your pizza creation on our menu, just to name a few!

If our entire goal is not reached, your contributions will still be put to good use, and kept local! In addition to the most immediate permitting concerns, here are some of the local businesses we source from, and this is where your contributions will go:
We want to hear from YOU
We haven't been doing this long, but we hope to...

The response that we have received from those of you who have stuck with us on this journey so far is overwhelming. The kind words, the constructive criticism, the shared stories. We want to hear more. We want to be a part of this community in a meaningful way, just as you have come to be a part of ours, whether you know it or not.

There is too much abundance in CA for anyone to be hungry, and everyone deserves a treat. We hope that we can continue to contribute to our community, including veterans, teachers, children, and those in need in meaningful ways. If this campaign is successful, we hope that you will let us know about opportunities to support the community in ways that are meaningful to you.

We want to know what we can do to better serve you. Please stop by, pick up the phone, follow us on social media. We are real people. Small business is not just about  the neighbor you support, its about how we can earn your trust and build a stronger community for all of us.
Your contribution is not without risk. I am asking you to take a leap of faith with me. But I promise, we will be holding hands when we jump.
If you can't contribute, we still appreciate your support! Perk number one
column2: for sharing and spreading the word, I will give you a giant hug. Not to brag, but I have been told on occasion I am the best hugger ever. Ask Jason when you see him slinging pies at Hippizzazz(Also, ask him for a cinnamon roll recipe. Totally worth it).

Come into the shop and say hi. Let us know you're here. You have no idea the power of a kind word. We'll share stories over garlic knots.
Thank you so incredibly much just for taking the time to check us out. We are incredibly grateful for this journey.",3.0,0,"1 Campaign
